name: Love or $
description:
This game is a fun simulation of real life. We are always busy making choices to achieve happiness  and there is no way back. You have a limited amount of time to get to happiness .  Remember that you cannot get back . In your path to happiness , you face situations where you need to choose between love and money. Be aware of traps as they cost you love . And make sure you have enough money to achieve happiness.

Use WASD to control character

Sources :

Sound effects from freesound.org

Background music from Cave story

Assets from simple 2D template
